original_text: Soon after that, there was bad trouble in Ephesus. Some people began to speak strongly against the Way of the Lord Jesus.
korean_text: 그 때쯤 되어 이 도로 말미암아 적지 않은 소동이 있었으니

sentences.original_text: there was bad trouble in Ephesus
Some people began to speak strongly
against the Way of the Lord Jesus
